=======

Encoded from the Arrow blu-ray release.
Includes both Italian and English audio tracks.
Includes audio commenatary track with Chris Alexander.

Notes:
The Arrow blu-ray delivers 2 hd-tansfers:
- from the original camera negative [with Italian titles]
- from the 35mm reversal dupe negative [with English titles]
The original negative features some discolouration but is
(imo) still the superior print.
This encode is from the original negative transfer.
